nodes.text: Jeslor Salaktori was a male bounty hunter and the chief executive officer of the Bounty Hunters' Guild chapter House Salaktori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Salaktori inherited leadership of the chapter by right of birth, and ruled the guild in a ruthless manner, although he outwardly portrayed himself as a friendly philanthropist. He oversaw the destruction of three minor house rivals and he strove to be able to pass on a far stronger guild to whichever of his children he chose to appoint as his heir than he had inherited himself. Salaktori employed an assassin droid to act as his bodyguard, which was disguised as a protocol unit.
